title: Spacious House For sale @ Pelawatta, Battaramulla
details:
Spacious House For sale @ Pelawatta, Battaramulla

Land & Floor Area -
10 perches, (3000sq,ft)

Bedrooms -
4
(3A/C), cement flooring / wardrobes / ceiling fans

Bathrooms -
3
Hotwater / shower cubicles

Indoor Specifications -
sitting / Living / Dining open to backyard
up-stair tv lounge with A/C

Outdoor Specifications -
open veranda with Front & rear Garden
Servant facilities (room, toilet & bath)

Kitchen / Pantry
Spacious kitchen near to modern pantry area

Special Description -

Vacant Position
Entire house made by 9 inch bricks walls
pipe born water with over head water tank
iron grills for super security purposes
fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas
3 phase electricity / French windows

Parking -
Double car porch

Boundaries -
surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate

Access road -

15 feet road infront of the House widened towards to the main rd up to 20 feet.
600m to Pelawatta city Limit

Key places -
Overseas School / Ministry of Education ( Isurupaya )
Parliament / Diyawanna walking tracks
Supper Markets / Banks / fish & vegetable stall

Nearest cities -
Talawatthugoda / Madiwela
Talahena / Koswatta

32 million, 320 Lakhs (Negotiable)
